page.title: 06Ecology-Ballantrae.
page.content: Scottish Wildlife Trust Conservancy Council support scientific area and pay summer warden.Nature Reserve has 55 acres dry and wet grassland,spit, shingle.Vegetation-Couch,fescue.Banks- Comfrey,pineapple mayweed,sandworts. Many wildflowers+papaver somniferum, sedum telephium,allium vineale,allium scorodoprasum,impatiens glandulifera, mertensia maritima <rare> Winter birds Greylag/pinkfooted geese,ducks.Fulmar, shag,eider,merganser,6 species gull, snipe,heron,curlew,linnet,skylark+41 "common birds"visit.Breeding-Whooper/ mute swans,shelduck,oystercatcher,sand piper,Arctic/little terns,sedgewarbler pied wagtail,ringed plover.Mink,stoat, rat,gull,heron cause nesting failures. Butterflies-Small tortoiseshell,meadow brown,peacock.Garden and tiger moths found.
